publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7302 Richard Baker: Scottish Police Muslim Association—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Police Muslim Association (SPMA) on hosting the Crime Affects All Communities event on 3 November 2010; notes that the event is aimed at the Asian community and seeks to raise awareness of the risk posed by organised criminals and to identify ways of reporting in confidence; recognises that, delivered along with the Scottish Crime and Drug Enforcement Agency, the event will bring together experts from law enforcement to examine a range of issues, including the role of Crimestoppers and how serious organised crime impacts on Scotland; congratulates the SPMA on all its work, and, recognising that this will be the first time that such an event has taken place in engaging with the Asian communities in this particular manner, hopes that it will lead to similar events in the future.
